description:
Any legal issue, from a personal injury to a family legal battle, can cause you concern about your future. From our Charlottesville, Virginia, office, we at the law firm of MartinWren, P.C., represent clients through a variety of pressing matters. Our skilled attorneys are committed to serving you with compassion, while aggressively and professionally pursuing an outcome that is in your best interest.

Our law firm routinely handles cases involving the following: business law issues such as intellectual property, starting up or closing down operations, succession and employment matters; family law cases involving adoption, property division and divorce; personal injury law issues like medical malpractice and motor vehicle accidents; residential and commercial real estate; and traffic violations. No matter what the details of your case may be, we prioritize maintaining open communication with you, so you know your options, can voice your concerns and can get answers to your questions.

As experienced trial lawyers, our staff at MartinWren, P.C., is prepared to go to court on your behalf. We also are adept at developing creative solutions to maximize your time and resources as your case progresses. Our law firm is committed to building a lasting relationship with you. We want you to feel confident and supported from the first phone call through the final resolution. For your convenience, we also have an office in Harrisonburg.
